name.ja: スパークハーツ・マクマ

requirement.en: Shuffle 2 FIRE Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters or 4 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Change the battle position of up to 2 face-up monsters on your field and/or monsters on your opponent's field. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your Deck, you can add up to 4 "Sparkhearts Girl", "Sparks", and/or "Curtain of Sparks" from your Graveyard to your hand.
